typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_desc as string,
		current_price as double,
		wholesale_price as double,
		brand_id as integer,
		brand as string,
		class_id as integer,
		class as string,
		category_id as integer,
		category as string,
		manufact_id as integer,
		manufact as string,
		size as string,
		promo_id as integer,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		discount_cost as double,
		promo_name as string,
		promo_type as string,
		min_qty as integer,
		max_qty as integer,
		discount_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'NONE',
	format: 'table') ~> postgresSQLItemInfo
source(output(
		HK_PROMOTION_ID as string,
		PROMOTION_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubPromotionLookup
postgresSQLItemInfo select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTableData
FilterPromoData derive(HK_PROMOTION_ID = md5(promo_id),
		LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'ITEM_INFO',
		PROMOTION_ID = toString(promo_id)) ~> Expression
CheckPromoIDExists alterRow(insertIf(iif(isNull(HK_PROMOTION_ID),true(),false()))) ~> UpdateStrategy
Expression, AzureSQLHubPromotionLookup exists(Expression@PROMOTION_ID == AzureSQLHubPromotionLookup@PROMOTION_ID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckPromoIDExists
SelectTableData filter(not(isNull(promo_id))) ~> FilterPromoData
UpdateStrategy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		HK_PROMOTION_ID as string,
		PROMOTION_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		HK_PROMOTION_ID,
		PROMOTION_ID = promo_id,
		LOAD_DTS,
		REC_SRC
	)) ~> AzureSQLHubPromotion
